history.text: Now, I will give you some history screenshots in the game for decision making.

This screenshot is three steps before the current step of the game. After this frame, your reasoning message was "<$history_reasoning_3$>". After the action was excuted, the game info was "<$history_action_info_3$>"

This screenshot is two steps before the current step of the game. After this frame, your reasoning message was "<$history_reasoning_2$>". After the action was excuted, the game info was "<$history_action_info_2$>"
This screenshot is the previous step of the game. After this frame, your reasoning message was "<$history_reasoning_1$>". After the action was excuted, the game info was "<$history_action_info_1$>"

sample_histroy_template.text: This screenshot is <$sample_step$> steps before the current step of the game. After this frame, your reasoning message was "<$sample_history_reasoning$>". After the action was excuted, the game info was "<$sample_history_action_info$>"
